Question
========
Two objects collide and bounce apart. Kinetic energy is

Answerlist
----------
* definitely conserved.
* definitely not conserved.
* conserved only if the collision is elastic.
* conserved only if there is no friction.

Solution
========
Kinetic energy is conserved only if the collision is elastic.
